quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$ requested that I go back to $npcName:11000031$ to relay the Runeblade expedition's situation, and to ask for support in moving the ancient book the Runerbladers left behind to $map:02000023$.

quest.name: Asimov's Wisdom
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$ requested that I deliver the command to dispatch a wizard who can decipher the ancient book to $npcName:11000042$ at $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$, and then go to $npc:11000075$ and ask that a draft be issued to gather support for the guardians.
quest.complete: Relay the command of $npcName:11000031$ to $npcName:11000042$ at $map:02000001$ $map:02000188$

quest.name: Checking In
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ says that in order to deliver $npcName:11000031$'s command to $npcName:11000075$, I must first go meet $npcName:11000119$ and get permission to enter the palace.

quest.name: Asimov's Command
quest.desc: After hearing I've been sent to deliver $npcName:11000031$'s command to $npcName:11000075$, $npcName:11000119$ permitted me to enter the palace and meet the empress.

quest.name: The Place to Gain Trust
quest.desc: $npc:11000075$ said that she will issue a draft for every guardian representative, and that we should go to $map:52000026$, where everyone is gathered, to review the current situation. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, near the top of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Reliable Time Management
quest.desc: $npcName:11000075$ says that she will provide the strength needed to gather everyone under one purpose, and has requested I return to $npcName:11000031$ in $map:02000023$ to relay the purpose of the palace.

quest.name: What Happened in Cheliska Bay
quest.desc: $npcName:11000043.$ has learned that everyone, including the adventurer from $map:02000001$, has been suffering in $map:02000063$ because of the pirates. She says to go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates to help the people who are suffering.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and help the people suffering from the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unexpected Situation
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: In That Moment
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000043$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Their Extended Hands
quest.desc: $npcName:11000043$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: An Act of Duty
quest.desc: Pushed by the principles of a priest and $npcName:11000031$'s purpose, $npcName:11000601$ has decided to join the Starlight Expedition. I am told to go to $map:02000023$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Scum of the Sea
quest.desc: $npcName:11000041$ cried out in anger, having heard the news that fellow Berserkers were struck by the pirates at $map:02000063$. $npcName:11000041$ says to go immediately to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates to put the fear of the Berserker in their hearts.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unforeseen Encounter
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: Pay It Forward
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000041$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Return and report to $npcName:11000041$ in $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$

quest.name: Gathering at the Hall
quest.desc: $npcName:11000041$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: The Berserker and the Loyalty
quest.desc: $npcName:11000041$, speaking calmly, said that as being a Berserker is founded upon loyalty, ignoring another guardian's plight is frowned upon. He will join the Starlight Expedition. As $npcName:11000041$ said, let's get to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Sudden Attack
quest.desc: $npcName:11000045$ said to go to the pirates' base in $map:02000063$ and defeat them, for the Green Hood eagle recon team was struck by the pirates in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Encounter of the Unexpected Kind
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: We've Got a Situation
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000045$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Return and report to $npcName:11000045$ in $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$

quest.name: To the Banquet Hall!
quest.desc: $npcName:11000045$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Heart Cannot Be Ignored
quest.desc: After thinking long and hard, $npcName:11000015$ decided to join the Starlight Expedition, for he knew that if he ignored his allies his heart would be burdened for the rest of his life. $npcName:11000015$ said that he too will soon leave for $map:02000023$, and that I should go ahead to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Unwelcomed Guest
quest.desc: $npcName:11000040$ says to go to the pirates' base in $map:02000063$ and defeat them, for the knighthood was struck by the pirates in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Unbreakable Spirit
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: What They Faced
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's get back to $npcName:11000040$ at $map:02000001$ $map:02000188$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Special Invitation
quest.desc: $npcName:11000040$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Chivalry
quest.desc: $npcName:11000119$ said that although the opinions of the Royal Guard are scattered, they ultimately decided to join the Starlight Expedition, and then told me to go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: 你真是个胆大妄为的家伙！
quest.desc: $npcName:11000046$说重他的炮手朋友在$map:02000063$尝尽了海盗的苦头。 $npcName:11000046$让我去切利斯卡海湾找到海盗根据地，并消灭海盗。

quest.name: An Unbelievable Scene
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: The Power of a Super Cannon?
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's go back to $npcName:11000046$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Annoying...or Hilarious?
quest.desc: $npcName:11000046$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Up in the Air!
quest.desc: Believing it may be the perfect chance to test the newly acquired weapon, the super cannon, and to show off the blinding power of the Heavy Gunners, $npcName:11000046$ decided to join the Starlight Expedition. $npcName:11000046$ says to go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and meet $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: These Rookies
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ says to go to the pirates' base in $map:02000063$ and defeat them for our Thief comrades who were hit by the pirates in $map:02000063$.
quest.complete: Go to $map:02000063$ and defeat the pirates inside $map:52000025$ by the water in the $map:02000067$.

quest.name: Injured Runeblader
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$ has fallen from an injury inside $map:52000025$. He requested that I defeat the pirates to help $npcName:11001229$ and the expedition team.

quest.name: Sincere Greetings
quest.desc: Before respectfully saying his good-byes, $npcName:11001229$ said that one day he will repay me for my kindness. Let's get back to $npcName:11000050$ at $map:02000188$ of $map:02000001$ and report everything that has happened in $map:02000063$.

quest.name: Walk Hard
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ told me to go to $map:52000026$ of $map:02000025$ to uncover the reason the guardian representatives have gathered upon the request of $npc:11000031$. The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Without a Choice
quest.desc: $npcName:11000050$ strongly disagrees in assisting other troops who offer no help of their own. However, the Thief troop leader, Jonathan Button, has commanded that they go support the expedition. And so it appears they've no choice but to join the Starlight Expedition. Let's go to $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ and deliver the news to $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: Outside of Interest
quest.desc: $npcName:11000051$ says there is an emergency at the palace and to get to $map:52000026$ immediately. $npc:11000051$ seems irritated and hopes it's not all a waste of time... The entrance to $map:52000026$ can be found by the $map:02000119$ entrance, northwest of $map:02000001$, toward the top part of the palace walls.
quest.manual: Enter $map:52000026$ through the $map:02000119$ palace wall, northwest of $map:02000001$, and observe the situation

quest.name: Interest Is Poison
quest.desc: It wasn't something the assassin was part of, says $npcName:11000051$. Nevertheless, $npcName:11000006$ asked what the emergency was about. $npcName:11000051$ requested I go to $map:02000208$ in $map:02000166$ and relay what happened at the banquet hall to $npcName:11000006$.
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11000006$ at $map:02000208$ located somewhere in $map:02000166$

quest.name: Individual Duty
quest.desc: $npcName:11000529$ shook his head nonchalantly at $npcName:11000051$'s words, and said an assassin just needs to do an assassin's job. $npc:11000529$ says I should help $npcName:11000051$, who was going to $map:52000027$ alone. A Humples member went undercover into Darkstar in order to reveal the link between $npc:11000065$ and $npcName:11000251$, but was caught and isolated in $map:52000027$. We must rescue him as well as acquire the evidence. Let's go to $map:52000027$ to help $npcName:11000051$ rescue the isolated Humples member.
quest.manual: Help $npcName:11000051$ at $map:52000027$ and secure the evidence

quest.name: A Courageous Act
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$ says that $npcName:11000051$ took the Humples member and the Runeblader to the hospital. $npcName:11000006$ also says that the Humples member was able to stay alive before $npcName:11000051e$ got there because of the Runeblader. Touched by the courageous act of the Runeblader protecting one of his men, $npcName:11000006$ revealed that he will join the Starlight Expedition. $npcName:11000006$ says since $npcName:11000051$ left with the first group to $map:02000023$, I should hurry and go to $map:02000035$ of $map:02000023$ and meet with $npcName:11000031$.

quest.name: 后街的传言
quest.desc: $npcName:11000515$说，最近后街的气氛很不寻常，各个势力的领导在$map:02000001$，以女王的名义举行秘密集会。 去$map:02000001$的$map:02000188$，见见$npc:11000050$，打听秘密集会的理由。

quest.name: 传说中的圣殿
quest.desc: $npc:11000050$说，为了抵抗符文剑士的叛徒$npcName:11001231$，大家决定合作集结成为星光远征队。 他们追着$npcName:11001231$进入了古代$npc:23000078$沉睡的符文圣殿！ 前往$map:02000112$寻找符文圣殿入口。

quest.name: 巨浪传说
quest.desc: $npcName:11000003$听说各个势力的首领在$map:02000001$有秘密聚会。 和$map:02000001$的$npc:11000119$见面，打听秘密聚会的理由。

quest.name: 神秘的圣殿
quest.desc: $npc:11000119$说，为了抵抗符文剑士的叛徒$npcName:11001231$，大家决定合作集结成为星光远征队。 他们追着$npcName:11001231$进入了古代$npc:23000078$沉睡的符文圣殿！ 前往$map:02000112$寻找符文圣殿入口。

quest.name: 拯救波波洛
quest.desc: $map:02000100$的$npcName:11000424$说不知道是不是幻听，她总会听到从远处传来的小孩子的哭声。 难道是因为失去了孙女，所以太过伤心了吗……老奶奶耳边听到的哭声究竟是谁的呢？ 循着哭声，去一探究竟吧。

quest.name: 回归自然
quest.desc: $map:02000100$的$npcName:11000233$说从$map:02000167$的$dungeonTitle:25001001$中传出了非常难闻的味道，他看上去十分痛苦的样子。 在曾经美丽的庭院中究竟发生了什么？

quest.name: 暗中交易
quest.desc: 在$map:02000203$运营着商店的$npc:11000623$说最近因为猖狂的赃物交易，市场的平衡被打破，请我前往据说在公开进行赃物交易的$dungeonTitle:21005001$看看传闻究竟是不是真的。

quest.name: 自由的翅膀
quest.desc: 在$map:02000146$帮助守护军的$npc:11000007$！ 他非常为难，说从小照顾自己的$npcName:11001835$大叔家的养鸡场的鸡都消失了，但是自己不能离开，他请我代替他去$map:02000087$帮助$npcName:11001835$。

quest.name: 暴烈警卫兵
quest.desc: 在$map:02000146$当守护军的$npcName:11000009$说从$map:02000023$传出了一些非常不好的传闻，请我去消灭让$map:02000023$的妖精陷入恐惧的暴烈警卫兵 $npc:23000039$。

quest.name: 危险的捉迷藏
quest.desc: 在$map:02000146$帮助守护军的$npc:11000007$！ 他说在$map:02000023$玩耍的孩子过了大半天还没回来，请我马上去$dungeonTitle:25004001$寻找孩子们，并且把他们安全送回家。

quest.name: Revealed Identity
quest.desc: A member of the Red Cape has infiltrated $map:02000025$ and kidnapped $npc:11000074$. There is no time to wait for the Royal Guard to be summoned, for $npc:11000074$'s life may be in danger. Let's hurry to $dungeonTitle:21004001$ and rescue the minister.

quest.name: Protect the Barrier of Life
quest.desc: $npc:11000031$ at $map:02000023$ $map:02000035$ intuits that the barrier of life is in danger from the dark energy coming from the east part of the forest. Let's go to $dungeonTitle:21002001$, located deep in the $map:02000023$ eastern forest, and cleanse the darkness!
quest.complete: Follow the open road at $map:02000066$, go inside $map:02000179$, and speak with $npcName:11000032$

quest.name: Honest Logs
quest.desc: $npc:11000136$ of $map:02000051$, having shared that an eagle from distant seas came and delivered news of ghost pirates, expressed curiosity in regards to the secret logs that could potentially reveal the identity of the pirate captain.
quest.manual: Defeat $npc:23000015$ in the $dungeonTitle:20010001$ dungeon and acquire $item:39000032$

quest.name: The Secret of the Clocktower
quest.desc: $npc:11000039$, having a memorial service in $map:02000049$, said that an ominous energy was felt from the northwest skies, and that I should observe it before something bad occurs.

quest.name: Real Friendship
quest.desc: $npcName:11000044$ says to go find Katramus, whom $npcName:11000006$$ mentioned, and bring back every clue that could help find Lennon or Eve.

quest.name: End of a Long Parting
quest.desc: Join $npcName:11000006$ in the $dungeonTitle:21017001$ slave rescue.

quest.name: Turn Back Time!
quest.desc: $npc:11000003$ of $map:02000001$, sharing the story of the $map:02000309$ robbery incident, said with confidence that the culprit who stole the time key had to have gone to $dungeonTitle:21008001$. Could $npc:11000003$'s assumption be right? Let's go to $dungeonTitle:21008001$ and check it out.

quest.name: To the Highlands
quest.desc:
The forces of darkness have set their sights on the Seven Heroes. The only two who remain in the public eye are $npc:11000134$ and $npcName:11000601$. It's up to you and Allon to keep them safe from the so-called "ragged wraith."
Head to $map:02000051$ and protect $npcName:11000134$.

quest.name: The Warrior's Test
quest.desc: $npcName:11003421$ refuses to let you into $map:02000051$ without passing his test. Go to $map:02000010$ and vanquish the $npcNamePlural:21090102$ and $npcNamePlural:21000088$.

quest.name: After the Attack
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000134$ joined the war party that's tracking down the mysterious figure in rags who attacked town. Meet with the town shaman, $npcName:11000039$, and warn her of the danger.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11000289$ in $map:02000051$ to return to $map:52010033$.

quest.name: Wolf Girl
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ is off looking for medicine to treat all the wounded. She's left $npcName:11000136$ behind to watch the hospital in the meantime, but it seems like she has something to ask you...

quest.name: Shells of Wellness
quest.desc:
The shell of $npcName:21000267$ can be used as a medicine to treat the injured. These critters like to live near the lava flows in places like $map:02000010$.
Gather some for $npcName:11000136$. It's not like you have more pressing business.

quest.name: Honorary Doctor
quest.desc: $npcName:11000136$ wants you to use her medicine to treat the injured. You're not a doctor, but what have you got to lose?

quest.name: Perion Persistence
quest.desc: You've finally found a responsible adult. Tell $npcName:11000039$ about your business in $map:02000051$.

quest.name: The Missing Warriors
quest.desc: $npcName:11003422$ says that the war party was ambushed. You should look for more survivors.

quest.name: The Casualty
quest.desc: You found $npcName:11003423$ from the war party, but she's badly hurt. Find something nearby that you can use to treat her wounds.

quest.name: Path of War
quest.desc: In spite of your best efforts, $npcName:11003423$ was too wounded to save. Before she passed away, she said that the war party was headed for the $map:02000048$.

quest.name: The Interlopers
quest.desc: You met $npcName:11000541$ at the $map:02000048$. She seems to know something about the war party, but she refuses to say anything until someone does something about the $npcNamePlural:21000065$, $npcNamePlural:21090082$, and $npcNamePlural:21091082$.

quest.name: End of the Chase
quest.desc: The war party should still be at $map:02000046$. But they were ambushed, and now monsters are closing in on the area. You need to find $npcName:11000134$ before something happens to him.
quest.complete: Search for $npcName:11000134$ at the top of $map:02000046$

quest.name: Burning Clue
quest.desc: $npcName:11000134$'s trail ends at the top of $map:02000046$. Where did $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$ vanish to? It seems the nearby torches have been lit recently. Perhaps you should see what happens when you relight them.
quest.manual: Light the first torch |Light the second torch |Light the third torch |Light the fourth torch
quest.complete: Search the hidden temple at the top of $map:02000046$

quest.name: Inside the Hourglass
quest.desc:
You found the entrance to a hidden temple at the top of $map:02000046$. There's a good chance that $npcName:11000134$ and $npcName:11000009$ are inside.
If you leave by mistake, examine the $npc:11003430$ in $map:02000046$ to return.

quest.name: Son of the Chief
quest.desc: $npcName:11000134$ attacked his own son, $npcName:11000009$. What could have caused him to do so? Since both father and son are unconscious, talk to $npcName:11000009$ in $map:52010033$.

quest.name: The Mysterious Woman
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000009$ isn't sure what happened to $npcName:11000134$. The so-called ragged wraith seems to be involved, along with a mysterious woman.
If $npcName:11000134$'s mind is being controlled, who is doing it... and how?

quest.name: Returned from Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ seems especially distressed after hearing what $npcName:11000009$ had to say. She's asked you to meet her in $map:52010034$.

quest.name: A Secret Treatment
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$ is convinced that the attack on Perion was led by the Inakimo, a tribe that vanished into the Land of Darkness a generation ago. She's seen their magic before, and she thinks she knows how to treat $npcName:11000134$'s illness. Gather $item:30000864$ from $map:02000095$.

quest.name: The Sleepy Witch
quest.desc: $npcName:11000039$'s medicine will stop $npcName:11000134$ from getting any worse, but it's not a true cure. $npcName:11000746$, the witch of the $map:02000103$ in Ellinia, knows many rituals to purify dark magic. Seek her out.

quest.name: A Divine Being
quest.desc: The ritual to cure the war chief requires pure, divine energy—and, as a witch, $npcName:11000746$ doesn't have access to that kind of energy. However, the unicorns of $map:02000053$ may be able to help.

quest.name: Unicorn Rescue Party
quest.desc: $npcName:11000027$, the unicorn you met in $map:02000053$, is in dire need of your help. All of his unicorn friends have been transformed by dark magic. You'll need those unicorns' help if you're going to save $npcName:11000134$...
quest.manual: Purify the $npcNamePlural:21000109$ by beating them up

quest.name: Aura of Light
quest.desc: $npcName:11000027$ and his friends have granted you the aura of light you need to save $npcName:11000134$. Return to $npc:11000039$ in $map:52010032$.

quest.name: The Light of Hope
quest.desc: The ritual successfully purified $npcName:11000134$ of darkness, but...

quest.name: The Guardian of Perion
quest.desc:
Even though the purification ritual was successful, the curse on $npcName:11000134$ returned moments later. $npc:11000039$ suspects that the Inakimo have found a way to corrupt $npcName:11003392$, a guardian golem who shares a magical bond with the war chiefs of $map:02000051$.
$npcName:11003391$ was sent to scout out $map:52010029$ and never returned. Go there and save both him and $npcName:11003392$ from the Inakimo's clutches!
quest.manual: Go to the $map:52010029$ via $map:52010031$, then save $npcName:11003392$ and $npcName:11003391$

quest.name: Perion's Coldest Heart
quest.desc: You had a... falling out with $npcName:11003391$ in $map:52010029$. How are you going to win him back over to your side?

quest.name: A Quick Apology
quest.desc:
Nothing says "I'm sorry" like a gift that you obtained for free. Give some incense to $npcName:11003391$ so that he forgives you for your earlier disagreement.
$npcName:11000289$ should be able to get you to $npc:11003391$'s house.

quest.name: House Visit
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000289$ says that $npcName:11003391$ looks depressed. Go to $npcName:11003391$'s house in $map:52010027$ and leave your gift.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11000289$ in $map:02000051$ to return.

quest.name: A Gift Left Behind
quest.desc: You just missed $npcName:11003391$. Break into his house and leave your apology gift for him to find later.

quest.name: A Bad Turn
quest.desc: There's something happening outside. You're certain you hear screaming. Go outside to $map:52010027$ and see what's happening.

quest.name: Suspect Victory
quest.desc:
You encountered $npcName:11003431$, chief of the Inakimo, in $map:52010027$. But where has he vanished to? And who is this viper he mentioned?
For now, hurry back to $map:02000051$.

quest.name: An Unexpected Raid
quest.desc:
You've returned to $map:02000051$ to find it under attack by the Inakimo. It seems that $npcName:11003431$ was a diversion...
$npcName:11000289$ will get the civilians to safety. You need to get to $map:52010031$ to join forces with $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009$.

quest.name: Save the Guardian
quest.desc:
$map:02000051$ won't be able to survive another attack if the Inakimo manage to take control of $npcName:11003392$'s golems. While $npcName:11000078$ and $npcName:11000009$ fight off the main Inakimo force, you need to sneak off to $map:02000313$ and save $npcName:11003392$ from its captivity.
Use the secret passage to get there.

quest.name: The War Chief's Mission
quest.desc: Go to $map:02000313$ through the $npcName:11003468$ in $map:52010031$ and rescue $npcName:11003392$ from the Inakimo.

quest.name: Looking Forward
quest.desc: After a long battle, $npcName:11000134$, $npcName:11000078$, and $npcName:11003392$ fell to protect $map:02000051$. $npcName:11000039$ blames herself for not doing enough to save them.

quest.name: A New Chief for a New Age
quest.desc: The new war chief of $map:02000051$, $npcName:11003457$, has pledged to support the battle against the darkness.

quest.name: 老人和时间胶囊
quest.desc: 为了$map:02000147$的$npc:11000225$，在樱花树周围扒开花瓣，寻找$item:30000095$。

quest.name: 猴子喜欢胶囊
quest.desc: 根据$map:02000147$的保安斯蒂夫的话推断，$npc:99000039$挖出了胶囊，放到了树的上面。
quest.manual: 从樱花树上的$npc:99000039$手中抢回时间胶囊

quest.name: Cat on a Crane
quest.desc: $npcName:11000366$ is wandering around $map:02000139$, worried sick about her lost cat, $npcName:11000367$. Maybe if you climb the crane behind her, you'll find the poor little kitty.

quest.name: The Break Up
quest.desc: $npcName:11000367$ has eloped with another cat. Break the news to $npcName:11000366$.

quest.name: Balloon Grabber
quest.desc: Let's retrieve the balloon over the tree above the portal to get to $map:02000116$. $npc:11000389$, who sells balloons in $map:02000115$, wants it.
quest.manual: Use rock climbing skills to retrieve the balloon from the tree above the $map:02000116$ portal

quest.name: Into the Woods
quest.desc: Let's deliver the packed lunch to $npc:11000128$ in $map:02000116$.

quest.name: Below His Station
quest.desc: $npc:11000065$ is complaining of a bad stench coming from lower $map:02000100$, where his least favorite constituents live. Help clean up that part of town.

quest.name: Interview of a Lifetime
quest.desc: To thank you for your service, $npc:11000065$ has sent a letter of recommendation on your behalf to Goldus Group. Go to $map:02000189$ for your interview.

quest.name: Praise Goldus
quest.desc: As Goldus Group's newest employee, it's time for you to meet $npc:11000252$ and sing the company song to him. The lyrics to the song, "$npc:11000477$," are hanging on the wall next to him.

quest.name: Demonic Roots
quest.desc: $npc:11000169$ requested that I go to $map:02000315$ and steal the $item:30000190$ from $npc:23100025$. Although I am bothered by his attitude (he seems to ask others for help in every difficult situation), I will aid him this one time, like $npc:11000169$ said to.

quest.name: Secret of the Dance
quest.desc:
$npc:11000542$ loves to dance, so he decided to raise some $npcPlural:21000069$ to dance with. However, his $npcPlural:21000069$ look pretty sad compared to the ones you see dancing in the wild.
Hunt some wild $npc:21000069$ around the $map:02000049$ and learn their secret.

quest.name: Dance of the Cacti
quest.desc: You found $itemPlural:30000029$ while hunting $npcPlural:21000069$. Is this what Tanz needs to get his own $itemPlural:30000029$ to dance?

quest.name: Rain, Rain, Come Again
quest.desc: Worried about the lack of rain in the Perion region, $npc:11000039$ set up totems in the lower area of $map:02000049$. Let's hold a rain ritual in front of all the totems in $map:02000049$.
quest.manual: Hold a rain ritual in front of all the totems in $map:02000049$

quest.name: 秘密接头
quest.desc: 偶然发现的可疑指令书。 查看内容后，上面记录了关于$map:03000145$发生的事件。 为了了解关于事件的详细信息，找到$map:03000145$的$npc:11000910$。

quest.name: 罗克尔博士的阴谋
quest.desc: $npc:11000910$告诉了我$map:03000145$内部正在发生的阴谋。 为了阻止罗克尔博士的危险研究，向$map:03000145$的$npc:11000911$请求帮助吧。

quest.name: 失败是成功之母
quest.desc: $npc:11000911$说，一定要关掉生产影子细胞的培养器。 在罗克尔博士搜集培养的细胞前，尽快关闭生产影子细胞的培养器。
quest.manual: 关闭生产影子细胞的培养器的

quest.name: 危机再现
quest.desc: $npc:11000911$说，虽然生产细胞的细胞培养器中断了，但是还不能放心。 消灭已经被影子细胞病毒感染的$map:03000145$的变种怪物。
quest.manual: 消灭被病毒感染的变种怪物

quest.name: 危险之人
quest.desc: $npc:11000912$说，在$map:03000145$被抓住并被洗脑的奴隶，他们的健康正在恶化。 搜查监视的$npc:40000019$就能获得$item:30000264$， 找到$item:30000264$，救出牢笼中的奴隶。
quest.manual: 找到$item:30000264$，打开牢笼，救出被关押的奴隶。

quest.name: The Enemy Within
quest.desc: $npc:11001043$'s job was to make sure the core technology of $map:02000277$ doesn't leak out. Unfortunately, there was a traitor from within; one of the team members was bribed by the mafia and stole the technology. The most urgent task at hand is to destroy the robotic weapons by manipulating the system, while simultaneously escaping the area. I have to destroy all of $npc:21000245$, $npc:21000247$, and $npc:21000242$ in $map:02000277$.
quest.manual: Destroy the killer robot weapons devastating $map:02000277$

quest.name: Heavy Security
quest.desc: Fortunately, the number of dangerous robotic weapons has been greatly reduced thanks to a quick response. But it's still too early to relax! $npc:11001043$ says the ones who stole the technology will come back to $map:02000277$ in order to destroy the evidence. $npcName:11001043$ is going to do whatever possible to capture the suspects. I'll need to activate the intruder detection sensor installed in $map:02000277$.
quest.manual: Install the intruder detection sensors in various spots around $map:02000277$

quest.name: 忠诚守卫！
quest.desc: $npc:11001129$因为人们对环境污染毫不关心而十分生气。其实只要大家都注意点就好了，但现在因为乱扔垃圾，$map:02000139$已经变成了垃圾场。 清除$map:02000139$周围散落的垃圾吧。

quest.name: 种了！
quest.desc: $npc:11001130$发现了罕见的$item:30000385$，但快乐只是暂时的。 为了采集$item:30000385$一头扎进了$map:52000037$，差点被击败。 帮助$npc:11001130$前往$map:52000037$采集$item:30000385$。

quest.name: 拥抱寒冷的怪物
quest.desc: $npc:11001131$说，因为气候异常，$map:02000085$的部分地区出现了难以融化的冰块，他出来进行调查。在周围观察了很久，$npc:11001131$发现，$npc:21099190$呼出的寒气就是冰块不能融化的原因，他委托我消灭$npc:21099190$。

quest.name: 这里有人！
quest.desc: $map:02000085$中央传来了一个女子的声音。前往声音来源的附近，在$map:02000330$传来了求助声。 在仓库中的$npc:11001138$说，因为仓库门被关上了，她和其他人一起被困在了仓库里。$npc:11001138$让我去找$npc:11001133$，他有仓库门钥匙。 在$map:02000085$寻找$npc:11001133$。

quest.name: 外面的空气
quest.desc: $npc:11001133$说情况紧急，让我快点打开$item:30000386$的门，救出被困的人们。 进入$map:02000330$内部，救出被困的人。

quest.name: 稀有的皮革
quest.desc: 在全国寻找稀有皮革的$npc:11001139$久违地发现了中意的皮革。$npc:11001139$一般都是亲自鞣皮，但并不擅长对付凶残的怪物。因此找人帮忙去$map:02000054$找到$npc:21000026$的$item:30000387$和 $npc:21000067$的$item:30000388$。

quest.name: 极坏的家伙
quest.desc: $npc:11000220$认为如果$map:02000136$完工，就会成为这附近最标志性的地标建筑。但那也得是“完成”的时候。最近凶残的怪物占领了洛菲尔大厦，破坏机械，还到处引起火灾，工程毫无进展。 为了顺利进行建设，消灭占领$map:02000136$的$npc:21000282$、$npc:21099049$吧！

quest.name: 必须要限量版
quest.desc: $npc:11001374$说阿尔利巴让自己来买最新的限量版跑车，但是因为怪物占领了$map:02010016$，他实在没勇气去。 拿着$npc:11001374$给的$item:30000480$ ，去找到$map:02010016$的$npc:11001375$吧。

quest.name: 阿利巴的空白支票
quest.desc: $npc:11001375$说不需要确认$item:30000480$，一定会给车的。 他爽快地让我拿走$item:30000481$。
quest.manual: 拿走在特别展台的最新限量版跑车吧

quest.name: 爱车一族
quest.desc: $npcName:11001375$觉得展示的车比自己还重要。 他请我在怪物再次袭击$map:02010016$之前，把展示的车子转移到安全的集装箱里保管。
quest.manual: 将$map:02010016$展示的车子转移到集装箱里

quest.name: 赌上选手的名誉
quest.desc: $map:02010020$的$npc:11001378$说世界上独一无二的，刻有自己名字的手套被怪物抢走了。 消灭$map:02010020$的$npc:21000419$、 $npc:21000420$，找回$item:30000484$吧。

quest.name: 师父的消息
quest.desc: $npcName:11000001$说$npcName:11001232$正在$map:02000361$找我，让我去见她。

quest.name: 重要的线索
quest.desc: $npcName:11001232$告诉我$npcName:11001229$已经回来了。但$npcName:11001229$正在急着寻找什么东西，旋即又去了$map:52000021$。前往$map:52000021$见见$npcName:11001229$吧。

quest.name: 古代之书
quest.desc: $npcName:11001232$说，$npcName:11001230$为了解读古代之书，已经到魔法密林去了。$npcName:11001230$说由于符文的力量，古代之书无法进行空间移动，因此只能坐船过去。据说他们打算通过$map:02000063$前往$map:02000023$。继续向$npcName:11001229$了解接下去的计划吧。
quest.complete: 在$map:02000361$的$npcName:11001229$那里了解接下去的计划

quest.name: 计划的开始
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$说要和$npcName:11001232$一起，前往$map:02000063$迎接$npcName:11001230$和远征队，让我前往$map:02000023$见见$npcName:11000031$。 找到$npcName:11000031$之后，转告$npcName:11001231$的情况和有关“终极秘技”的消息，事先取得他的谅解并请求帮助吧。
quest.complete: 前往$map:02000023$和$npc:11000031$见面，并请求帮助

quest.name: 晚了一步
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$听说符文剑士和远征队即将到达$map:02000063$的消息之后，说$map:02000063$的海盗猖獗，担心同伴们无法安全回来。$npcName:11000031$让我前往$map:02000063$确认同伴们的生死，并把他们全部安全地带前往$map:02000023$。 前往$map:02000063$确认符文剑士同伴们的生死吧。
quest.manual: 前往$map:02000063$确认同伴们的生死

quest.name: 负伤
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$和远征队乘坐的船刚到达$map:02000063$，就遭到了海盗的袭击。现场一片混乱，到处都是受伤的远征队员。 $npcName:11001232$希望优先照顾$npcName:11001233$和其他的伤员，并清理远征队的废船。他让我去帮助$npcName:11001229$扫荡海盗根据地，找回被抢走的古代之书和其他物品。 到切利斯卡海岸外围洞穴去寻找海盗根据地吧！
quest.complete: 在$map:02000063$外围洞穴附近寻找海盗根据地

quest.name: 接踵而至的难题
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$说，和自己的伤势相比，当务之急是帮助正在附近和海盗们战斗的$npcName:11001229$。 和远征队一起扫灭海盗根据地中的海盗，找回被抢走的古代之书。
quest.manual: 扫荡海盗根据地中的海盗
quest.complete: 和海盗根据地中的$npcName:11001229$对话

quest.name: 急切的请求
quest.desc: $npcName:11001229$让我马上前往$map:02000023$，把这里的情况告诉$npc:11000031$，并向他求助。 快返回$map:02000023$，见见$npcName:11000031$吧。

quest.name: 温暖的关怀
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$说我看上去很累，符文剑士同伴们和远征队正在赶回$map:02000023$，因此让我先去休息一下。 前往$map:02000023$找$npc:11000029$吧。

quest.name: 将危机变成希望
quest.desc: 拉里说受伤的符文剑士同伴和远征队员刚刚到达$map:02000023$。因为符文剑士们的伤势比预计的更重，因此$npcName:11000031$和$npcName:11000032$正在$map:02000179$亲自为他们进行治疗。 前往$map:02000179$，见见师父$npcName:11001229$和同伴们吧。

quest.name: 无法放缓的脚步
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$说，为了解读古代之书，阻止$npcName:11001231$，需要更多的兵力。 在同伴们接受治疗和修整的时候，$npcName:11000031$让我去见见$npc:11000075$，让她下达紧急召集令。为了见到$npc:11000075$，必须先去找$npc:11000119$，获取王室出入许可。 前往$map:02000001$见见$npc:11000119$吧。

quest.name: 阿西莫夫的指令
quest.desc: 听说必须把$npcName:11000031$的指令传达给$npc:11000075$之后，$npcName:11000119$才会同意我进入王宫。 进入$map:02000025$，和$npcName:11000075$见面，转达$npcName:11000031$的指令吧。

quest.name: 特殊召集
quest.desc: 确认了$npcName:11000031$传达的内容之后，$npc:11000075$说情况比预计的更加紧迫，会马上向各个守护势力的代表们下达召集令。 $npcName:11000075$说在各个守护代表聚集到一起之前，让我在$map:52000026$等待。 在$map:02000001$西北部$map:02000119$方向入口周边，可以找到$map:52000026$入口。到那里去看看吧。

quest.name: 艰难的汇合
quest.desc: $npcName:11000601$说，最重要的是说服对远征队的请求持否定态度的侠盗和刺客，如果能赢得亨福斯的首领$npcName:11000006$的心，刺客应该就会加入进来。 按照萝娜的建议，前往$map:02000208$，和$npcName:11000006$见面吧。

quest.name: 证明
quest.desc: $npcName:11000006$说，为了查明$npc:11000065$和$npcName:11000251$的关系，有个亨福斯的干事偷偷潜入了黑星会，结果被他们关在了地下监狱，情况非常紧迫。 前往$map:02000100$找到并进入$map:52000027$入口，帮助正在执行任务的$npc:11000051$，救出被困的亨福斯队员。

quest.name: 怀着希望的约定
quest.desc: 为了报答我成功救出了亨福斯队员，$npcName:11000006$答应选拔最好的刺客加入星光远征队，派往$map:02000023$。 返回$map:02000023$的$map:02000179$，向师父$npcName:11001229$报告这件事吧。

quest.name: 逐渐显露的真相
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$说，从卡利夫岛拿来的古代之书中的一卷完成了解读。$npcName:11000031$终于知道在哪里能找到存放着有关“终极秘技”的情报的地方。书上记载的坐标是$map:02000129$。 前往$map:02000129$，寻找古代符文剑士先祖们留下的线索，然后返回$map:52000028$吧。
quest.manual: 前往$map:02000129$寻找有关终极秘技的线索

quest.name: 真正的力量源泉
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$说，如果能把搜集到的$item:30000538$组合起来，就能知道古代符文剑士先祖们搜集到“终极秘技”的背景和历史，以及找到那种力量的方法。 等待$npcName:11000031$把$item:30000538$组合起来吧。

quest.name: 命运的对决
quest.desc: $npcName:11001230$说自己会在把远征队集结起来，完成最后的检查之后，再去和大家会合。让我去保护先出发的$npcName:11001229$。 跟着$npcName:11001229$前往$map:02000112$，找到并进入$map:52000029$入口吧。

quest.name: 无法忍受的背叛感
quest.desc: $npcName:11000031$好像对$npcName:11001229$的事情感到遗憾，又对$npcName:11001231$的消失感到不安。他说目前最要紧的事情，是陪伴在那些受伤的同伴身边。 $npcName:11000031$说自己会制定接下去的计划，让我先去安慰一下$npcName:11001230$。

quest.name: 怀着一丝希望……
quest.desc: $npcName:11001232$说从黑暗之地回来之后，$npcName:11001229$一直在为弟子制作礼物。 到$map:02000179$的树下找到放在那里的箱子，打开看看吧。
quest.manual: 前往$map:02000023$的$map:02000179$找到伊修罗的礼物

quest.name: 燃烧的黑金市
quest.desc:
不明生物突然入侵黑金市！ $npcName:11000044[gender:0]$为了解决问题，召集了黑风的全部兵力， 发布了紧急命令，“黑色蘑菇”。 在$map:52000067$地区根据$npc:11003200$的 指示，抵挡不明生物的入侵吧。
<font color="#909090">（重新登录时，以任务进行中的台词可再次进入。）</font>
quest.manual: 完成所有黑金市防御任务 <font color="#909090">在执行任务的过程中，可通过台词再次进入</font>

quest.name: Tria in Crisis
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000069$ warns that the forces of darkness are marching on Tria. $npcName:11000064$ is rallying the royal guards, but there simply aren't enough forces to protect the city. Hold the line while $npcName:11000069$ gets reinforcements!
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11001238$ to return.
quest.manual: Hold off $npcName:11001698$'s army at $map:52000068$ <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11001238$ to return.</font>

quest.name: The Shield of Tria
quest.desc:
The enemy failed to capture Tria, but many guards fell in the battle. Speak to the injured with $npc:11000076$ at the $map:52000068$.
If you leave by mistake, speak with $npcName:11001238$ to return.

quest.name: Unite
quest.desc: The Maple Alliance needs your assistance. Speak with Empress $npcName:11001969$ in $map:52000087$.

quest.name: Eccentric Interests
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$, the master wizard, has concocted a spell using the Lumenstone to track the magical power of the lumarigon. Her expertise is vital in the mission to find $npcName:11001698$, but she's stubbornly refusing to do any field work.
See if you can change her mind.

quest.name: Eclipse of Ice and Fire
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ finally agreed to go on the mission with you. Begin by meeting her at $map:52000088$.

quest.name: Remnants of Dragon Magic
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ senses lumarigon magic coming from the rune stones in $map:52000088$. Take a closer look at these stones.

quest.name: Bathing in Fire
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ is sure that the dragon you're tracking is in fact lumarigon—or at least related to the lumarigon in some way. Based on what you found, you should search for more evidence in $map:52000089$ at $map:02000268$.

quest.name: The Wounded Dragon
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ can learn a lot about a dragon from its scales. Examine the scales in $map:52000089$.

quest.name: Teleportation Tag-along
quest.desc:
The dragon scales in $map:52000089$ were tainted with dark magic. $npcName:11000042$'s spell is now pointing her towards the Land of Darkness, but first she needs to visit the $map:02000146$ to get a more precise reading.
Speak with $npcName:11003089$ at the $map:02000146$.

quest.name: Breath of Darkness
quest.desc:
After arriving at $map:02000146$, $npcName:11000042$ picked up massive amounts of lumarigon magic in $map:52000090$. She needs you to hurry there, as the natural dark energies of the forest could make the dragon hard to track if it moves on.
Defeat $npcNamePlural:29000164$ in $map:52000090$, which can be found at $map:03000043$ in the Land of Darkness.

quest.name: The Phase-shifted Shadows
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$ has pinpointed the exact mix of lumarigon and dark magic needed for her tracking spell. Surprisingly, the location revealed to her by the spell isn't far.
Meet her at the $map:52000092$ beneath the $map:02000146$.

quest.name: Magic Counter
quest.desc:
$npcName:11000042$ discovered a stretch of distorted space. It's as if something is being hidden by magic. She is preparing a counterspell to remove the cloak, but she needs your help to gather reagents.
Gather $item:30000726$ in $map:52000093$.
quest.manual: Defeat monsters in $map:52000093$ or collect $item:30000726$ from runes

quest.name: Dark Essences
quest.desc: To continue the plan to reveal whatever is hidden here, gather $item:30000727$ in $map:52000094$.

quest.name: Uncover the Darkness
quest.desc: To complete the counterspell, place rune stones on the circles of the magic seal. You can get rune stones in the $map:52000092$.
quest.manual: Place rune stones from $map:52000092$ on the magic seal

quest.name: Finally, Suddenly
quest.desc: The counterspell is ready! Overload the phase distortion with $npcName:11000042$.

quest.name: Shadows on the Move
quest.desc:
The cloak has been lifted, revealing none other than $npcName:11001698$'s stronghold. As if on cue, you've spotted her armies preparing to launch a new attack.
There's no time to call for reinforcements. Do what you can to delay the enemy's movements for now, then fall back and alert the alliance when you have a chance.

quest.name: Planted Feet
quest.desc:
There is no end to $npcName:11001698$'s army. $npcName:11000042$ will try to teleport alliance reinforcements to the battle. Stand your ground until then.
If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11003091$ in $map:52000091$ to return.
quest.manual: Survive the enemy's attack <font color="#909090">If you leave by mistake, talk to $npcName:11003091$ in $map:52000091$ to return.</font>

quest.name: Secret Knights on the Scene
quest.desc: $npcName:11000042$ successfully teleported your reinforcements to the battlefield! Captain Allon and his Secret Knights are just in time to help you take care of the enemy army.

quest.name: Locked Down
quest.desc: Blackeye and his Dark Wind agents are dominating the battlefield, thanks to the master wizard's mass teleportation spell.

quest.name: Militia's Arrow
quest.desc: $npcName:11001585$ and her Green Hoods have cut off the retreat of $npcName:11001698$'s army.

quest.name: The Stronghold Revealed
quest.desc:
After all this time, you finally stand before $npcName:11001698$'s stronghold. It was hidden in a pocket dimension in the center of Maple World this entire time!
With $npcName:11001698$'s forces routed, the Maple Alliance plans to push its advantage and go on the offensive. Speak with $npcName:11003089$ about your next steps.

quest.name: The Maple Alliance Attacks
quest.desc:
The time has come for the Maple Alliance's counterattack! Strike into the heart of $npcName:11001698$'s base, Madrakan, and win a victory for justice!
Use the Enter Dungeon button in the quest notification window to enter the dungeon and do the quest.
quest.manual: Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to $dungeonTitle:21024001$ and clear Madrakan Castle Bailey

quest.name: First Victory
quest.desc:
The siege on Madrakan was a rousing success! With her army destroyed and her stronghold under Maple Alliance control, $npcName:11001698$ was forced to retreat. Somehow you doubt you've seen the last of her, however...
Return to $map:52000087$ and deliver the good news to $npcName:11001969$.

quest.name: Magically Late
quest.desc:
You're late. To class. Again.
But you're a mage, so who cares, right? In fact, you used to skip class all the time, so just being late is an improvement. So relax. Take your time.

quest.name: Chores in Silence
quest.desc: You missed class after all. Professor $npcName:11000032$ may look like an angel, but there's nothing angelic about his punishments.

quest.name: The Weight of Knowledge
quest.desc: Cleaning without magic? The indignity of it! You have a feeling that $npcName:11000032$ is just getting started. Find out what other punishments he has in mind.
quest.manual: Bring text books to the podiums

quest.name: On the Banishing of Monsters
quest.desc:
How humiliating! What's the point of learning magic if you still have to do chores by hand? Why, you might as well be a lowly warrior, rolling around in the dirt!
Oh, $npcName:11000032$ is staring at you. You'd better close your quest journal and talk to him.

quest.name: An Unorthodox Lesson
quest.desc:
Fighting those monsters was fun, but now $npcName:11000032$ is standing in the corner mumbling to himself. It's a little creepy.
He's probably thinking up your next lesson. What could it be?

quest.name: An Unexpected Duel
quest.desc:
Did those monsters seem a little strong for a classroom practice session...? Nah, must be your imagination.
$npcName:11003146$ looks pretty unhappy right now. What's going on?

quest.name: Transfer Student
quest.desc:
Even though you lost your duel with $npcName:11003146$, it was still a ton of fun. $npcName:11003146$ didn't seem to have much fun, though...
And now Headmaster Asimov is here, and at some point the classroom exploded, and... and...
You may be in a lot of trouble.

quest.name: Thrilling Life Abroad
quest.desc:
And so began your life in Tria, where the only escape from your days of boredom is taking the occasional oddball assignment. Luckily for you, there's a caravan coming from $map:02000062$, and they could use an extra pair of arms to make sure the merchants aren't scared off by any especially aggressive butterflies.
Talk to $npcName:11003180$ to let him know you've arrived.

quest.name: Infiltrate Madrakan
quest.desc:
The time has come for the Maple Alliance's counterattack! Strike into the heart of $npcName:11001698$'s base, Madrakan, and win a victory for justice!
Use the Enter Dungeon button in the quest notification window to enter the dungeon and do the quest.
quest.manual: Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to $dungeonTitle:21025001$

quest.name: Madrakan's Monarch
quest.desc:
The time has come for the Maple Alliance's counterattack! Strike into the heart of $npcName:11001698$'s base, Madrakan, and win a victory for justice!
Use the Enter Dungeon button in the quest notification window to enter the dungeon and do the quest.
quest.manual: Use the Enter Dungeon button to travel to $dungeonTitle:20022002$ and clear Madrakan Spire

quest.name: Fusion Core Test
quest.desc: A world where people do not have to rely on magic for power—that is your dream! And today, you make a great step towards your dream. Follow $npcName:11003291$ into your lab to test your latest invention, the fusion core.

quest.name: Blazing Passion
quest.desc: A fire started during the fusion core test. You need to put it out before something terrible happens!

quest.name: Slime Coolant
quest.desc: You put out the fire, but the core's temperature is critical. You need $itemPlural:30000771$ to cool it down.

quest.name: Shutting Down
quest.desc: You managed to stop the fusion core from going critical. It's time to replace the fuses and reboot the system.
quest.manual: Replace the core fuses (Pick them up and place them on the orange rectangles) |Reboot the fusion system

quest.name: Unexpected Guests
quest.desc: Some old friends have paid an unexpected visit. Well, ex-friends. Nowadays they're more interested in stirring up trouble than helping Maple World. Defeat their $npcName:29000260$ and kick them out.

quest.name: Who Needs Friends?
quest.desc: Years ago, $npcName:29000261$ was your friend. Now he's been ordered to take your fusion core by force. Show him that you won't give up your invention so easily!

quest.name: The Mayor Speaks
quest.desc: The HAPPY protocol worked perfectly. Sure, your workshop was destroyed, and Edelstein Square got hit hard by the blast, but otherwise, a great success. Talk to $npcName:11003294$.

quest.name: Big Picture
quest.desc: Your savior has appeared! $npcName:11000264$, the great alchemist of $map:02000270$, has come to pay for the damage to Edelstein. But what are his intentions?

quest.name: Ladin's Watchful Eye
quest.desc: Left with no other options, you went to work for $npcName:11000264$. Your first assignment: escort goods from $map:02000001$ from $map:02000270$. Meet with your contact in the guard, $npcName:11003180$.

quest.name: Rendezvous
quest.desc: You've arrived in Kerning City for a mission. Meet with $npcName:29000290$ and the Rooks at the entrance to $map:52000112$.

quest.name: The Raid
quest.desc: Your mission: raid the Dark Wind headquarters disguised as a $map:52000112$. The members of your organization are ruthless killers, but you are determined to complete this mission without any fatalities on either side. Convince $npcName:29000290$ to let you complete this mission solo.

quest.name: Interrogation
quest.desc: You successfully defeated the $npcNamePlural:11003336$ without killing any of them. You intended to interrogate the bartender, but $npcName:11003185$ showed up without warning and seems annoyed at your non-lethal methods.

quest.name: Underground
quest.desc: Even though you weren't able to get answers from your hostage, $npcName:11003185$ seems to know a lot about this facility. Continue your raid and subdue the remaining $npcNamePlural:11003336$... without killing anyone.

quest.name: Dark Wind's Secrets
quest.desc: You managed to capture a $npcName:11003337$ and learn the whereabouts of the information the Rooks need. Search through the books to find $item:30000775$. If you hadn't shown mercy, you doubt the $npcName:11003337$ would have been so cooperative...

quest.name: Way of the Rooks
quest.desc: Do the Rooks know only killing? Convince $npcName:11003185$ that there is another way.

quest.name: Traitor
quest.desc: $npcName:11003185$ has declared you a traitor to the Rooks simply because you want to end the senseless killing. You have no choice but to fight your fellow $npcNamePlural:29000293$.

quest.name: Resurfacing Emotions
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003185$ keeps talking about things you don't remember. A Rooks soldier isn't supposed to have emotions, so why do you feel so conflicted? Angry? Sorrowful?
Questions for another time. $npcName:11003185$ is trying to kill you. Defend yourself!

quest.name: Farewell
quest.desc:
You couldn't defeat $npcName:11003185$, but you did manage to use one of his own techniques to escape. It was a move usually used to take a life, but you used it instead to save your own.
There's no time for sentimentality. Speak with the $npcName:11003337$ and make your escape.

quest.name: Lost Assassin
quest.desc:
Starting today, you are no longer a Rook. You have taken countless lives in their name—lives that you may never be able to atone for—but now you have a chance to take a stand against their evil. Head to $map:02000062$ and stop the Rooks' attack on the caravan.
Thus begins your search for redemption... and your lost memories.

quest.name: Rage and Peace
quest.desc: Out of 998 matches against the old man, you have won... none. But you won't give up yet! Nothing will quench your rage! Not even Lilin forcing you to help her with her stupid flower arrangement!

quest.name: An Escalation of Events
quest.desc: These $npcNamePlural:29000294$ have no fighting spirit. Cut them down! Cut them all down!!

quest.name: The Old Man's Thoughts
quest.desc: You were feeling better after taking out your anger on the flowers, but then Lilin had to go and prod you some more. The old man appeared and broke up your fight, and now he's getting ready to talk your ears off...

quest.name: The Red Blade
quest.desc: Lilin wants you to gain complete control over the god of rage sealed inside of you. Until you do, the original inhabitants of the island can never return—including her know-it-all big brother. You aren't against her goal. You also want to control the rage inside so that you can use its power. The old man things you should work together, and has even offered to train you himself. You can't wait to turn that training against him...

quest.name: Real Training
quest.desc: You thought you would have to waste time with practice dummies, but the old man actually summoned monsters for you to practice against! As it turns out... real battle is fun!

quest.name: Real Training Part 2
quest.desc: This is fun. Fun! Fun!! You defeated the second round of monsters with ease. Why didn't the old man let you do this sooner?!

quest.name: The 999th Match
quest.desc:
999 matches against the old man. This last one was... different. For a moment there, it was if he could actually kill you. You need to work on your defenses...
It was a lesson you will never forget. The 1,000th match will be different!

quest.name: Looming Omen
quest.desc: Just as you finished training, a letter came for the old man. From the capital! As soon as he read it, he turned pale and set sail for the mainland. It's been days since he left. Lilin's a nervous wreck. She's even started seeing things, like the creepy shadows that are crawling your way. Wait, there are creepy shadows crawling your way...!

quest.name: Finding the Old Man
quest.desc:
You fought off the shadow monsters that attacked without warning. It seems your training is already paying off.
But now Lilin is freaking out. She's pulled something out of the monsters you defeated. What could it be...?

quest.name: Never Back Down
quest.desc:
Lilin found a piece of the old man's cape on one of the monsters. She's scared, but you know it takes more than that to stop the old man!
You've decided to leave the island and find him. After all, he owes you more training! It looks like you're going on that warrior's pilgrimage, after all.

quest.name: Hero's Rest
quest.desc: Tria Royal Cemetery is the final resting place for those brave heroes who made the ultimate sacrifice to protect Maple World. You've come here to visit an old friend and compatriot, $npcName:11003344$.

quest.name: What You've Missed
quest.desc: In a visit to Tria's cemetery, you catch your old friend $npcName:11003344$ up on the events of recent days. Things aren't quite the same without him around.

quest.name: Regrets
quest.desc: While visiting your old friend $npcName:11003344$ at Tria's cemetery, you can't help but wonder whether there was something you could have done to save him. Suddenly, your musings are interrupted by a mysterious knight.

quest.name: An Early Inspiration
quest.desc:
The mysterious knight reveals herself to be $npcName:11003897$, former captain of Tria's Royal Knights, and one-time instructor to both $npcName:11003679$ and $npcName:11003861$. Further, it seems she was the one who saved you from hoodlums during your childhood and set you on the path of the knight.
It seems she's come to check up on you after a talk with $npcName:11003679$ and $npcName:11003861$.

quest.name: A Knight's Purpose
quest.desc: As you wrestle with feelings of guilt and sorrow over Joddy's death, $npcName:11003897$ tries to help you. She hands you a mysterious crystal.

quest.name: The Will of the Fallen
quest.desc:
The crystal turns out to be something called a lapenshard. Said to grant special power to those who seek it, they began appearing throughout the world some time after the attack on Tria.
Seeking to wake you from your sorry state, $npcName:11003897$ offers to help you with your training as a knight.

quest.name: A Knight's Watch
quest.desc: After some gentle nudging by $npcName:11003897$, you resume your training as a knight.

quest.name: Training's End
quest.desc: After a difficult but successful period, you've completed your training with $npcName:11003897$. Speak with her to find out what comes next.

quest.name: The Lapenshard's Might
quest.desc: No wonder it was tough... you weren't aware of the weights added to the armor and shield! That is why the training was tough! Looking back, it was tough at first, but you didn't feel the weights at all towards the end of the training. Was this all... because of the power of the lapenshard?

quest.name: The Shield of the Frontier
quest.desc: It seems the power of the lapenshards are more than simple rumor. $npcName:11003897$ suggested you join the Frontier Foundation to learn more about the shards, and test your newfound strength.The Foundation is an organization dedicated to regulating the possession and usage of lapenshards so they do not fall into the wrong hands.

quest.name: The Call of the High Priest
quest.desc: After a group of Royal Guards encountered an unidentified wraith and were inflicted with incurable wounds, you were called to the priest academy to assist. There you met with Bishop $npcName:11003901$ and High Priestess $npcName:11003904$. Considering their own healing magic came to no avail, you can't help but wonder how you're supposed to help.

quest.name: The Power of Belief
quest.desc: It seems your light, and the darkness that wounded these soldiers are two sides of the same coin. It was to that end the High Priestess requested your aid in healing them. Can you succeed where $npcName:11003901$ and $npcName:11003904$ have failed? You have to at least try. You might not have been able to save $npcName:11003344$, but perhaps you can help these men...

quest.name: When Hope is Lost
quest.desc: Despite your great effort, it seems you cannot save the wounded guardsmen. Whatever affliction they are suffering from only seems to feed upon your efforts to heal the soldiers. As you stand powerless to aid them, you can only wonder, is this truly what is meant to be?

quest.name: The Darkest Hour
quest.desc: One of the guards mustered the last of his strength to thank you for trying to save him and his brothers-in-arms before closing his eyes, perhaps for the last time. As all signs of life vanished from his body, you can't help but wonder, is there truly nothing you can do?

quest.name: Traces of Life
quest.desc: ...No, not yet! You can still feel the trace of life within the wounded soldier... You can't let these men die without a fight!

quest.name: And Then, Something Miraculous
quest.desc: Much to everyone's surprise, a miracle has occurred. After all your efforts and determination, have you managed to conjure a light bright enough to stave off even the unyielding embrace of death?

quest.name: Brilliant Light
quest.desc: It seems that the brilliant light you conjured restored the guardsmen to health. Did the goddess herself answer your prayer? How did you manage to perform such a feat?

quest.name: Radiant Potential
quest.desc: As the guardsmen profess their unending gratitude for your saving their lives, you cannot help but be humbled. It seems reward enough that they're alive, but if the men have their way, there will be a celebration before the day is through.

quest.name: Unleashing the Divine
quest.desc:
According to High Priestess $npcName:11003904$, your little miracle may be connected to a crystal known as a lapenshard. These lapenshards are said to bestow power upon those that seek it.
$npcName:11003904$ said the guardsmen and the specter alike were both seeking one such lapenshard, resulting in their confrontation. It seems in the dust-up, fragments of the lapenshards ended up in the soldiers' wounds.
In a fortunate turn of events, it was these very fragments which empowered your magic enough to save the soldiers' lives. If you could only learn to harness the lapenshards' incredible power, you could use it to do truly great things.

quest.name: Looking Toward Tomorrow
quest.desc: High Priestess $npcName:11003904$ told you about the Frontier Foundation, a newly established organization created by the royal court to govern the use of lapenshards. There's a lot you could learn at a place like that. If there's a chance that unlocking the secrets of the lapenshards means you'll never again be powerless to save the people you care about, then the road ahead is clear.

quest.name: Priest Job Rank Quest 10
quest.desc: High Priestess $npcName:11003904$ told you about the Frontier Foundation, a newly established organization created by the royal court to govern the use of lapenshards. There's a lot you could learn at a place like that. If there's a chance that unlocking the secrets of the lapenshards means you'll never again be powerless to save the people you care about, then the road ahead is clear.

quest.name: Aisha's Letter
quest.desc: You received a letter from $npcName:11003929$. Why would she send you a letter? Is her phone broken? What is this madness?!

quest.name: Sweet Science
quest.desc: $npcName:11003929$ has been secretly working with a new material called lapenshard. She claims that it generates an incredible amount of energy, but you doubt such a thing is possible. Still, it wouldn't hurt to look...

quest.name: Off the Charts
quest.desc: These readings can't be right. According to $npcName:11003929$'s research, a single lapenshard outputs over 100 times the energy of the fusion core! If Ladin gets his hands on this, it's only a matter of time before he tries to weaponize it...

quest.name: Make a Mint
quest.desc: So, $npcName:11003929$ had her eye on the almighty meso. A lapenshard generator could create enough electricity to power Tria for a week after being turned on for just one minute. But...

quest.name: In the Wrong Hands
quest.desc: If someone were to use the lapenshards to create a bomb, it could change the world forever—and not in a good way. You don't know how your enemies found out about the fusion core in the first place, but you can't afford the same to happen with this new technology. You have to take steps to make sure that nobody can use this tech, no matter how revolutionary it is...

quest.name: Back to Reality
quest.desc:
Money is meaningless. Patents won't make you happy. Heck, being rich is more trouble than it's worth.
At least, that's what you keep telling yourself...

quest.name: The Big Picture
quest.desc: To your surprise, $npcName:11003929$ had a really good idea. Use quantum cryptography to prevent the bad guys from getting their hands on your specs, then use it to upgrade your own weapons. After all, Maple World needs more powerful heroes—heroes like you!

quest.name: The Peacemaker
quest.desc: Now it is time to create a weapon to end all wars: the Peacemaker! You and $npcName:11003929$ had better get to work before $npcName:11000264$ gets back from his business trip.

quest.name: Power On
quest.desc: It's the 60th boot-up attempt. Quantum cryptography is locked and energy output is optimal. We are a go!

quest.name: The Search for Lapenshards
quest.desc: Your greatest invention, the Peacemaker, is online! But you'll need to find more lapenshard samples if you want to keep improving the technology. Where could you get such a thing?

quest.name: Climbing the Ladin Corp Ladder
quest.desc: $npcName:11003929$ suggests you join the Frontier Foundation, an organization dedicated to studying lapenshards. While you're at it, you can get some more lapenshard samples for her. But why does she insist on staying behind...?

quest.name: A Boss's Promise
quest.desc:
While you were off adventuring, $npcName:11003929$ made a life for herself at Ladin Corp. But even if Ladin treats her better than you ever did, she still believes in you!
You resolve to give her back pay and even a bonus when this is all over. Somehow!

quest.name: Breaking Limits
quest.desc: You set off to train in the hopes of growing stronger, but the same old methods just aren't cutting it. You need a new approach...

quest.name: Master Haster
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ showed up out of the blue! He seemed pretty composed for someone who betrayed the Green Hoods and handed a lapenta over to the forces of darkness! But the biggest surprise of all was that he came here... to train you?

quest.name: The Terms of the Deal
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ offered to train you, under one condition: no questions. That's no easy choice. On the one hand, you have a lot of unanswered questions. On the other, there's a lot the man could teach you...

quest.name: Accelerated Learning
quest.desc: You reluctantly accepted $npcName:11003932$'s offer to train you. Your progress is expedited by the lapenshard, a miraculous crystal capable of awakening new power in those that seek it.

quest.name: Finding Your Path
quest.desc: You decide to give up on getting answers about $npcName:11003932$ actions in exchange for his help with your training. At least for now, it's time to forget about the past and focus on becoming stronger.

quest.name: Nock and Loose
quest.desc: Your training with $npcName:11003932$ wasn't easy, but after a while it was almost like old times. But things will never be like before, will they? Not after what $npcName:11003932$ did.

quest.name: Questions and Answers
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ said he had nothing more to teach you. After your training, you feel stronger. $npcName:11003932$ may think his business here is done, but he owes you some answers!

quest.name: Seeya Never
quest.desc: Training's over, so you can't hold that over me! Now tell me, where have you been all this time?! Why did you betray us?!

quest.name: Haster's Note
quest.desc: By the time you awakened, $npcName:11003932$ was gone. You never even got a chance to say goodbye. $npcName:11003932$ didn't even have the courtesy to leave a note, but instead left behind some sort of pamphlet.

quest.name: A Clear Path
quest.desc: $npcName:11003932$ left a pamphlet for you to find calling for adventurers to join something called the "Frontier Foundation." Apparently, it's the new governing body in charge of regulating access to lapenshards. Maybe Haster wants you to go there. You can learn more about the lapenshards, and maybe you'll run into Haster again in the process. Your reunion with $npcName:11003932$ was short-lived, but at least he's shown you the way forward.

quest.name: Moonlight on the Serene Sea
quest.desc: Having returned home to Calibre Shore. The unchanging moonlight sea puts you at ease. Worried that your abilities have peaked, you have come to seek out your old teacher. Perhaps he can show you the way forward?

quest.name: Confronting Holstatt
quest.desc: It's difficult to believe the traitor $npcName:11004028$ has returned to Calibre Island after all this time. It seems he's searching for something called a lapenshard. Whatever he's up to, he must be stopped!

quest.name: Obtaining Vengeance
quest.desc: Can you really defeat one of the Eight Blades? Can you defeat $npcName:11004028$? No, there's no time for self-doubt... You must win!

quest.name: Resonance
quest.desc: When you crossed blades with $npcName:11004028$, a torrent of energy was released which permeated your body. As the strange energy flowed through you, you recognized it immediately... It was the very same rune magic used by $npcName:11004028$ and his fellow Jibricia traitors.

quest.name: Heir to the Twin Arts
quest.desc: Just as you somehow obtained the power of the Jibricia, it seems that $npcName:11004028$ has obtained the power of the Pelgia. Thus it seems you have both become "heirs to the twin arts"...

quest.name: Echoes of the Clash
quest.desc: The timely arrival of your teacher and his associates has spared you what would certainly have been the battle of your life. Your master also noticed the changes in your powers. It seems you have a lot to talk about.

quest.name: The Miraculous Crystal
quest.desc: Runeblades who can muster the power of both Jibricia and Pelgia are known as Rune Sages. Such a state is said to be unattainable, and yet you and $npcName:11004028$ are the living proof. Acting Elder Blade Landevian believes it was the lapenshards' influence that made it possible. A miraculous crystal that grants power to those who desire it. What was $npcName:11004028$ planning to do with such power?

quest.name: The Path of the Rune Sage
quest.desc: Your master says that the royal court has requested that Terrun Calibre offer their assistance to the Frontier Foundation, an organization responsible for securing and regulating the lapenshards. Preventing $npcName:11004028$ from getting his hands on the lapenshards is reason enough to join, but this may prove a good opportunity to train your new power. The next time you face $npcName:11004028$, you plan to be ready.

quest.name: The Wolf Returns to Its Den
quest.desc: You returned to your old neighborhood after a series of hectic adventures, only for no one to greet you. You can't help but wonder what it's all been for—your quest to defend the weak. If you yourself have reached the limits of your power, how can you really defend anyone?

quest.name: The Big Fish's Lament
quest.desc: In a way, $map:63000020$ is where your grand adventure really began. You can't help but reminisce over old memories. Your identity, your sense of self-worth, it all springs from having the power to defend others. But on the cosmic scale, the famous Gray Wolf is just a small big fish in a wide ocean.

quest.name: Dr. Chen, Pugilist and Therapist
quest.desc:
Training alone won't be enough to reach the new heights of power you seek. You need to make an evolutionary leap. As you stood around $map:63000020$ moping about your situation, you ran into $npcName:11003948$.
Much to your surprise, $npcName:11003948$ seemed quite willing to help you unwind your dilemma.

quest.name: People Like Us
quest.desc: Vasara Chen believes that all of your self-righteous talk about protecting the world is just a pretext for what you truly love: fighting. Perhaps he's right.

quest.name: A Dialogue of Fists
quest.desc: Maybe all this started off being about fighting and getting stronger, but somewhere along the way you found that defending those who couldn't defend themselves was your calling. But is this philosophy holding you back from the power you seek? They only way to settle the question is with a duel.

quest.name: Rivals
quest.desc: Your fight with $npcName:11003948$ showed him to be a formidable opponent worthy of the title of $map:63000020$'s champion. You may not have defeated him, but much was revealed to you over the course of your battle.

quest.name: The Roads We Walk
quest.desc:
Your fight with $npcName:11003948$ has left you with a newfound perspective, and a new sense of direction. You find yourself feeling faster and stronger than ever before.
It seems $npcName:11003948$ too owes his new path to your battle. But, he reveals, the two of you had a little help in the form of something called a lapenshard.

quest.name: The Wolf and the Stone
quest.desc: It seems Vasara was ordered to bring you the lapenshard by $npcName:11000251$. $npcName:11000251$ wants to send you to the Frontier Foundation—the governmental body responsible for regulating the lapenshards—as a Blackstar mole. Vasara however has another idea.

quest.name: A Wolf Unchained
quest.desc:
$npcName:11003948$ ignored $npcName:11000251$'s instructions and destroyed the Blackstar listening device, thereby setting you free. It seems he wants you to granted you to become stronger.
He suggests you travel to the Frontier Foundation to learn about the lapenshards and grow stronger. The next time you meet, he's expecting a good fight.

quest.name: Welcome to the Foundation
quest.desc: You've arrived at the Frontier Foundation, a sprawling manor filled with adventurers.
quest.complete: Go to the center of the foyer

quest.name: The Commencement Speech
quest.desc: $npcName:11003971$, director of the foundation, began her commencement speech in which she explained the mission of the organization. That is until she noticed you, and became quite distracted. Have the two of you met somewhere?

quest.name: Hero of the Family
quest.desc: According to $npcName:11003972$, personal butler to the foundation director, you saved $npcName:11003971$'s life during the siege on Tria. Henceforth, and without your knowledge, you became a hero to her family—resulting in a special assignment. Special assignments are a good thing... right?

quest.name: A Special Assignment
quest.desc: While the other adventurers have already formed into groups and commenced their missions, you await instruction regarding a special assignment. What could it be?

quest.name: Unseasonable Weather
quest.desc:
The Frontier Foundation has two major concerns when it comes to the lapenshard: The first is preventing their unauthorized distribution and misuse, and the second is investigating a series of strange phenomena endangering lives.
Your mission is to deal with the latter. It seems that at just about the same time the lapenshards made their first appearance, strange weather conditions began cropping up around the globe. Further, they've persisted for far longer than one would expect of normal weather. Odds are, they are tied in some way to the lapenshards.
It's not clear where this investigation will take you, but one thing is certain: adventure awaits!

quest.name: Lapenshards and You
quest.desc: It's been suggested that your special assignment from the Foundation gives you dispensation to use the lapenshards as you see fit. Why not use the powers of the lapenshards to give the bad guys what-for? You've earned it. Go wild!

quest.name: 摆错地方的书
quest.desc: 好像有人把看过的书放在了错误的书架上。但$npc:11000670$并不喜欢新家。 把$item:30000082$从图书馆入口的书架上拿下来，放到原来的书架上去吧。对了，原来的书架上了锁，必须从$npc:21000216$那里把钥匙抢过来。 看书的人是不是发现书架上了锁，所以把书放在了其他地方呢?
quest.manual: 从图书馆入口的书架上拿出$item:30000082$|消灭$npc:21000216$，寻找$item:30000102$

quest.name: 迟到的消息
quest.desc: 不知道为什么，派遣到$map:02000118$的近卫队正在遭遇粮荒。他们让$npc:11000546$尽快把粮食送过去…… 平时不负责管理粮食的$npcName:11000546$说必须去村子里筹备粮食，因此可能会比预计的时间晚一些。把这个消息告诉$npc:11000157$吧。 还有，为了让$npcName:11000546$能尽快赶到近卫队基地，顺便把$map:02000118$的怪物消灭掉吧。

quest.name: 长柄梳小偷
quest.desc: $npc:11000795$说$item:30000244$的库存数量突然减少了，她对此忧心忡忡。 弄不好的话，要自己出钱赔偿。 刚好$npc:21000013$说看到了偷走$item:30000244$的人。到$npc:21000013$找回$item:30000244$，交给$npc:11000795$吧。

quest.name: 在商店中购买饮料
quest.desc: $npc:11000352$说，在炙热的阳光下在公园里巡逻，很快就感觉口渴了。 帮$npcName:11000352$去$map:02000209$购买$item:30000245$吧。 告诉商城职员，是$npcName:11000352$派你过去的话，就不需要付钱。

quest.name: 需要结算
quest.desc: $npc:11000795$说收到了老板的指示，因为$npc:11000352$欠了太多钱，没办法继续赊账了。 回去把这个不幸的消息告诉$map:02000147$的$npcName:11000352$吧。

quest.name: 烦人的苍蝇
quest.desc: $map:02000138$的水果店里没什么客人，倒是有很多苍蝇。正是这些苍蝇把仅剩的一些客人也赶了出去。 水果商人$npc:11000867$非常郁闷，说苍蝇一定是把下水道当成家了。 从$npc:11000867$那里领取$item:30000246$，将$item:30000246$撒在下水道盖子下面，把苍蝇赶走吧。

quest.name: 封嘴
quest.desc: $npc:11000211$说，有个陌生人让他帮着把一个神秘的背包藏起来，他爽快地答应了。因为那个人答应给他一大笔金币作为酬谢，所以没办法拒绝。 但是接受了那个人的委托之后，总感觉有点不太放心。而且有几个怪物看见$npc:11000211$把背包藏了起来。为了不让消息传出去，$npc:11000211$让我去封住那些怪物的嘴！ 虽然感觉这样做不太好，但还是接受$npc:11000211$的委托吧。

quest.name: 不祥的预感不会有错
quest.desc: 担心变成现实了吗？$npc:11000211$说黑星会的人突然向他询问背包的下落，他本打算骗他们，结果却被痛扁了一顿。 据说$npc:11000867$有治疗跌打损伤的灵药，帮浑身疼痛的$npc:11000211$见见$npc:11000867$吧。

quest.name: 紧俏的便便
quest.desc: $npc:11000867$说必须重新制作药物，让我去搜集需要的材料。 $npc:11000867$所说的材料不是别的，是$npc:21000161$的头饰！ 从$map:02000138$的$npc:21000161$那里搜集$item:30000247$，然后交给$npc:11000867$吧。

quest.name: 良药苦口
quest.desc: $npc:11000867$制作灵药的材料之一，是$item:30000248$！ $npc:11000867$说，把卖不掉的$item:30000248$扔进了垃圾桶，让我去垃圾桶里寻找$item:30000248$。 虽然不太乐意，但还是去$map:02000138$翻找垃圾桶，搜集到$item:30000248$之后，交给$npc:11000867$吧。

quest.name: 消除火灾隐患
quest.desc: $map:02000136$周边摆放着气罐，但$npc:21000282$还在到处乱扔炸弹。 $npc:11000222$担心$npc:21000282$会引起大的火灾或爆炸，因此感到很不安。 为了减轻$npc:11000222$的不安，把$map:02000136$周边的$npc:21000282$赶走吧。

quest.name: Celebratory Gathering
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$, $npcName:11001297$, and $npcName:11001294$ are celebrating having safely completed their missions as dragon knights. Let's join the gathering.

quest.name: By Neccessity, Not Chance
quest.desc: The Huntis Federation and the dragon knights, two groups destined to unite, completed the missions together. $npcName:11001297$ is happy to have met $npcName:11001292$ and $npcName:11001294$ through this event. I've heard that $npcName:11001292$ has a similar story of how he met $npcName:11001294$...

quest.name: Grand Opening
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$ recalled the grand opening of $map:02010053$ and $npcName:11001294$ described the circumstances of that day.
quest.manual: Speak with $npcName:11001493$ and go to the past|Speak with $npcName:11001499$ of the past

quest.name: The Customer Is Right
quest.desc: $npcName:11001294$ continued to explain that because he was the only customer, he was able to eat without stopping. However, after he appeared, $npcName:11001292$ couldn't handle cooking alone... $npcName:11001292$ finished the story for $npcName:11001294$ of that nightmarish day...
quest.manual: Speak with $npcName:11001498$ and go to the past|Observe the situation of that day

quest.name: Origins of Fate
quest.desc: From the mark on his wrist, $npcName:11001292$ recognized that $npcName:11001294$ was a dragon knight just like him. $npcName:11001297$ also brought up the first day she met $npcName:11001292$.

quest.name: Second Fate
quest.desc: $npcName:11001297$ suffered from an unknown source of pain until $npcName:11001292$ recognized that she was a dragon knight after hearing about her symptoms.

quest.name: 你们也要变成一道光
quest.desc: $npcName:11001292$对$item:30000515$上面的其他内容很感兴趣。前往$map:52010022$找到$item:30000515$吧。

quest.name: 寻找能帮上忙的人
quest.desc: $npcName:11000221$正在找人来帮她。见见$npcName:11000221$，问问她需要什么帮助吧。

quest.name: 谁都不知道
quest.desc: 有消息来了，信上说让去$map:03000135$，查看放在破旧书桌上的秘密指令书。这封信是谁送来的？那个指令书上写得又是什么？

quest.name: 连续不断的任务
quest.desc: 据说$npcName:11000614$正在$map:03000135$等我。会有什么任务呢？

quest.name: 威爷的打算
quest.desc: 在大家都因为觐见仪式的取消而感到遗憾时，只有$npcName:11000251$露出了微笑。 $npcName:11001690$说，$npcName:11000251$为了低价买入或者说抢走因觐见仪式取消而变得无用的东西，联系上了王室的负责人。

quest.name: 双面奈尔夫
quest.desc: 知道了武器库盗窃事件牵涉到$npcName:11000492$的理由后，抢夺觐见仪式物资变得更困难了。要怎么做才能安慰因为计划被妨碍而生气的$npcName:11000251$呢……

quest.name: 奈尔夫的下落
quest.desc: 因为$npcName:11000492$犯下的武器库盗窃事件，曾经打算抢夺觐见仪式物资的黑星会的计划落空了。如果抓住$npcName:11000492$，在$npcName:11000251$面前跪地求饶，说不定能够平息$npcName:11000251$的怒火。快点找到$npcName:11000492$的下落吧。

quest.name: 黑屋
quest.desc: $npcName:11001677$说，在$map:52000034$的进行施工的时候，非常吵闹。虽然不知道为什么停止施工，但他感觉很好。前往$npcName:11001677$说的地方吧。

quest.name: 奈尔夫留下的东西
quest.desc: 虽然来到了$map:52000037$……但可惜的是$npc:11000492$已经死了。$npc:11000492$为什么会死在这里？他究竟出了什么事？ 在他的周围会不会有关于他贪污和死亡有关的线索呢？ 打起精神来，仔细搜查$npc:11000492$的周围吧。

quest.name: 新的线索
quest.desc: 听了$npc:11000492$战败的消息，以及在周围发现了奇怪手册的事情之后，$npc:11000169$让我去直接向$npc:11000119$报告这段时间调查的结果。 前往$map:02000001$见见$npcName:11000119$吧。
quest.manual: 从$map:02000001$的$npc:11000169$那里拿回可疑的手册

quest.name: 沙贝尔的呼唤
quest.desc: $npc:11001682$.在$map:52000034$等待灰狼，似乎有话要说。

quest.name: 眼中钉
quest.desc: 黑星会在买卖$item:20000046$和$item:20000015$的事情对$map:02000100$来说并不是秘密。而且他说没人在意这件事情。只有黑风在惹麻烦……

quest.name: 黑星会的秘密成员
quest.desc: $npcName:11001674$将老大的指示传达给灰狼。他让我如果在黑风感觉到奇怪的气氛，就马上告诉黑星会。

quest.name: 检查目标
quest.desc: $npcName:11000251$将手册交给了灰狼。这似乎是黑风队员的手册，有什么内容呢？
quest.manual: 鼠标左键双击背包的$item:39000050$，查看内容

quest.name: 黑风的指令
quest.desc: 据说黑风队长$npcName:11000044$正在找我。 前往$map:02000100$的$map:02000152$看看吧。

quest.name: 礼貌性的呼唤
quest.desc: $npc:11001682$让灰狼去$map:52000034$。虽然似乎没什么事……

quest.name: 杰茜的呼唤
quest.desc: $npcName:11000515$很高兴能在$map:02000216$见到灰狼。 是因为有什么话要说吗？

quest.name: 她想说的话。
quest.desc: $npcName:11000515$对觐见仪式物资盗窃事件的犯人被认为是亨福斯的事情表示怀疑。

quest.name: 孤独的秘密
quest.desc: 据说黑风队长$npcName:11000044$正在找我。 前往$map:02000100$的$map:02000152$看看吧。

quest.name: 新的指示
quest.desc: 在黑暗之地发现了超链接管理的建筑。和$npcName:11001678$、$npcName:11001686$汇合，调查建筑吧。

quest.name: 可疑的仓库
quest.desc: $npcName:11001678$说，在已经废弃的仓库里居然有警卫系统，非常可疑。在这里能获得情报吗？还有，$npcName:11000251$想得到什么情报呢？

quest.name: 莫名其妙的线索
quest.desc: $npcName:11001678$在零件上写了字。去那里就能找到我想找的东西吗？

quest.name: 我不在的地方
quest.desc: 黑星会让我去调查$map:52000039$。$npcName:11001679$和$npcName:11001687$先出发了，快点去$map:52000039$看看吧。

quest.name: 危机的瞬间，闪光的友爱
quest.desc: $npcName:11001679$处于危险中。$npcName:11001687$非常着急地说要去找$npcName:11001679$……

quest.name: 正式调查
quest.desc: $map:52000039$的危险要素似乎都已经被消除了，正式开始调查内部吧。

quest.name: 无解之事
quest.desc: $npcName:11000515$说$npcName:11000251$在找我，让我去$map:02000156$

quest.name: Popularity
quest.desc: $npcName:11000076$ needs your attention urgently. What a burden it is to be so popular!

quest.name: Settling the Ranks
